Desc.entry: Aims to provide an accessible legal service to people who live or work in Sheffield and who are oppressed, disadvantaged or live in poverty. Specialises in employment, housing and immigration cases, for which the Centre has a Legal Services Commission contract and offers representation in these areas. Also gives advice for those who feel that they have been unfairly discriminated against in the provision of goods and services. Hearing impaired clients can contact the centre by text. Home visits by arrangement. Company limited by guarantee no 1859060. Self or any referral.

Pubs.entry: Annual Report; Leaflets on various legal issues
